name: Be Aware (Sam Rooney)
description:
You are lost in the depths of a labyrinthine maze. It is pitch black, save for the periodic light fixtures at most corners and some long stretches. There is something in the maze, searching relentlessly for you and dedicated to killing you.

If you can evade it for long enough, and keep your bearings to enough of a degree that you can locate the button that will unlock the escape vault, you will pass on to safer parts unknown.

Inspired by A Really Dark Maze by Miziziziz.

NOTE

There currently is no Mac version, as I don't have a Mac computer and thus building it in Unity wouldn't auto-generate the correct permissions for the file. I will add a functional Mac version as soon as I can get my hands on the right computer.
